verses.verse: Then Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and all the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%>, the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, that they might bring up <S%H5927><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, which is Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

And all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves unto king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> at the feast <S%H2282><s%> in the month <S%H3391><s%> Ethanim <S%H388><s%>, which is the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
And all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And they brought up <S%H5927><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and all the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that were in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, even those did the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bring up <S%H5927><s%>.

And king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> unto him <S%H6440><s%>, were with him before the ark <S%H727><s%>, sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%>, that could not be told <S%H5608><s%> nor numbered <S%H4487><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> unto his place <S%H4725><s%>, into the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H3671><s%>, even under the wings of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>.

For the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> spread forth <S%H6566><s%> their two wings <S%H3671><s%> over the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and the poles <S%H905><s%> there above <S%H4605><s%>.

And they drew out <S%H748><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%>, that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the poles <S%H905><s%> were seen out <S%H7200><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place before <S%H6440><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%>, and they were not seen <S%H7200><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%>: and there they are unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

There was nothing in the ark <S%H727><s%> save <S%H7535><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H3240><s%> there at Horeb <S%H2722><s%>, when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when they came out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3548><s%>, when the priests were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6051><s%>, that the cloud filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>,

So that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>: for the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Then spoke <S%H559><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> that he would live <S%H7931><s%> in the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%>.
I have surely <S%H1129><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> you an house <S%H1004><s%> to live in <S%H2073><s%>, a settled place <S%H4349><s%> for you to stay in <S%H3427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> about <S%H5437><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: (and all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%>;)

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which spoke <S%H1696><s%> with his mouth <S%H6310><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and has with his hand <S%H3027><s%> fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Since the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, I chose <S%H977><s%> no city <S%H5892><s%> out of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%>, that my name <S%H8034><s%> might be in it <S%H977><s%>; but I chose David <S%H1732><s%> to be over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it was in the heart <S%H3824><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, Whereas <S%H3282><s%> it was in your heart <S%H3824><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> unto my name <S%H8034><s%>, you did well <S%H2895><s%> that it was in your heart <S%H3824><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H7535><s%> you shall not build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>; but your son <S%H1121><s%> that shall come forth out <S%H3318><s%> of your body <S%H2504><s%>, he shall build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> unto my name <S%H8034><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has performed <S%H6965><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> that he spoke <S%H1696><s%>, and I am risen up <S%H6965><s%> in the room of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and sit <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%>, and have built <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And I have set <S%H7760><s%> there a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark <S%H727><s%>, where is the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which he made <S%H3772><s%> with our fathers <S%H1><s%>, when he brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the presence of <S%H5048><s%> all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and spread forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>:

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, there is no God <S%H430><s%> like you <S%H8064><s%>, in heaven above <S%H4605><s%>, or on earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H8104><s%>, who keep covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with your servants <S%H5650><s%> that walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you with all their heart <S%H3820><s%>:

Who have kept <S%H8104><s%> with your servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that you promised <S%H1696><s%> him <S%H1696><s%>: you spoke also with your mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and have fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it with your hand <S%H3027><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Therefore now <S%H3068><s%>, Lord God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, keep <S%H8104><s%> with your servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that you promised <S%H1696><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, saying, There shall not fail <S%H3772><s%> you a man <S%H376><s%> in my sight <S%H6440><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; so <S%H7535><s%> that your sons <S%H1121><s%> take care <S%H8104><s%> to their way <S%H1870><s%>, that they walk <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me as you have walked <S%H1980><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.

And now <S%H430><s%>, O God of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, let your word <S%H1697><s%>, I pray you <S%H539><s%>, be verified, which you spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto your servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>.

But will God <S%H430><s%> indeed <S%H552><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>? behold <S%H8064><s%>, the heaven and heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> cannot contain <S%H3557><s%> you <S%H637><s%>; how much less this house <S%H1004><s%> that I have built <S%H1129><s%>?

Yet have you respect <S%H6437><s%> unto the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>, and to his supplication <S%H8467><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, to listen <S%H8085><s%> unto the cry <S%H7440><s%> and to the prayer <S%H8605><s%>, which your servant <S%H5650><s%> prays <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to day <S%H3117><s%>:

That your eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be open <S%H6605><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and day <S%H3117><s%>, even toward the place <S%H4725><s%> of which you have said <S%H559><s%>, My name <S%H8034><s%> shall be there <S%H8085><s%>: that you may listen unto the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which your servant <S%H5650><s%> shall make <S%H6419><s%> toward this place <S%H4725><s%>.

And listen <S%H8085><s%> you to the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>, and of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when they shall pray <S%H6419><s%> toward this place <S%H4725><s%>: and hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%> your living <S%H3427><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>: and when you hear <S%H8085><s%>, forgive <S%H5545><s%>.

If any man <S%H376><s%> trespass <S%H2398><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, and an oath <S%H423><s%> be laid <S%H5375><s%> upon him to cause him to swear <S%H422><s%>, and the oath <S%H423><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your altar <S%H4196><s%> in this house <S%H1004><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%>, and judge <S%H8199><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%>, condemning <S%H7561><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, to bring <S%H5414><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>; and justifying <S%H6663><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> him according to his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

When your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> be struck down <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%>, because they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you <S%H7725><s%>, and shall turn again to you <S%H3034><s%>, and confess your name <S%H8034><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%>, and make supplication <S%H2603><s%> unto you in this house <S%H1004><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and bring them again <S%H7725><s%> unto the land <S%H127><s%> which you gave <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

When heaven <S%H8064><s%> is shut up <S%H6113><s%>, and there is no rain <S%H4306><s%>, because they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you <S%H6419><s%>; if they pray toward this place <S%H4725><s%>, and confess <S%H3034><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> from their sin <S%H2403><s%>, when you afflict them <S%H6031><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of your servants <S%H5650><s%>, and of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that you teach <S%H3384><s%> them the good <S%H2896><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> where they should walk <S%H3212><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> upon your land <S%H776><s%>, which you have given <S%H5414><s%> to your people <S%H5971><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

If there be in the land <S%H776><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%>, if there be pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, blight <S%H7711><s%>, mildew <S%H3420><s%>, locust <S%H697><s%>, or if there be caterpillar <S%H2625><s%>; if their enemy <S%H341><s%> besiege <S%H6887><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> of their cities <S%H8179><s%>; whatever plague <S%H5061><s%>, whatever sickness there be <S%H4245><s%>;

Whatever prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplication <S%H8467><s%> is made by any man <S%H120><s%>, or by all your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which shall know <S%H3045><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of his own heart <S%H3824><s%>, and spread forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%> your living <S%H3427><s%> place <S%H4349><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> to every man <S%H376><s%> according to his ways <S%H1870><s%>, whose heart <S%H3824><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%>; (for you <S%H3045><s%>, even you only, know the hearts <S%H3824><s%> of all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>;)
That they may fear <S%H3372><s%> you all the days <S%H3117><s%> that they live <S%H2416><s%> in <S%H6440><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which you gave <S%H5414><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Moreover concerning a stranger <S%H5237><s%>, that is not of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, but comes out <S%H935><s%> of a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> for <S%H4616><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake;

(For they shall hear <S%H8085><s%> of your great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, and of your strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and of your stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>;) when he shall come <S%H935><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%>;

Hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%> your living <S%H3427><s%> place <S%H4349><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> according to all that the stranger <S%H5237><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> to you for <S%H5971><s%>: that all people of the earth <S%H776><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%>, to fear <S%H3372><s%> you <S%H5971><s%>, as do your people Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that this house <S%H1004><s%>, which I have built <S%H1129><s%>, is called <S%H7121><s%> by your name <S%H8034><s%>.

If your people <S%H5971><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against their enemy <S%H341><s%>, wherever <S%H1870><s%> you shall send <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H6419><s%>, and shall pray unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> which you have chosen <S%H977><s%>, and toward the house <S%H1004><s%> that I have built <S%H1129><s%> for your name <S%H8034><s%>:
Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%> their prayer <S%H8605><s%> and their supplication <S%H8467><s%>, and maintain <S%H6213><s%> their cause <S%H4941><s%>.

If they sin <S%H2398><s%> against you <S%H120><s%>, (for there is no man that sins <S%H2398><s%> not <S%H599><s%>,) and you be angry with them <S%H5414><s%>, and deliver them to the enemy <S%H341><s%>, so that they carry them away <S%H7617><s%> captives <S%H7617><s%> unto <S%H6440><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>, far <S%H7350><s%> or near <S%H7138><s%>;

Yet if they shall repent <S%H7725><s%> themselves in the land <S%H776><s%> where they were carried captives <S%H7617><s%>, and repent <S%H7725><s%>, and make supplication <S%H2603><s%> unto you in the land <S%H776><s%> of them that carried them captives <S%H7617><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and have done perversely <S%H5753><s%>, we have committed wickedness <S%H7561><s%>;

And so return <S%H7725><s%> unto you with all their heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all their soul <S%H5315><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>, which led them away captive <S%H7617><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> unto you toward <S%H1870><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>, which you gave <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> which you have chosen <S%H977><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> which I have built <S%H1129><s%> for your name <S%H8034><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you their prayer <S%H8605><s%> and their supplication <S%H8467><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> your living <S%H3427><s%> place <S%H4349><s%>, and maintain <S%H6213><s%> their cause <S%H4941><s%>,

And forgive <S%H5545><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> that have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you <S%H6588><s%>, and all their transgressions where they have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against you <S%H5414><s%>, and give them compassion <S%H7356><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them who carried them captive <S%H7617><s%>, that they may have compassion on them <S%H7355><s%>:

For they be your people <S%H5971><s%>, and your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which you brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>:

That your eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be open <S%H6605><s%> unto the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>, and unto the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to listen <S%H8085><s%> unto them in all that they call for unto you <S%H7121><s%>.

For you did separate <S%H914><s%> them from among all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, to be your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as you spoke <S%H1696><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%>, when you brought <S%H3318><s%> our fathers <S%H1><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

And it was so <S%H8010><s%>, that when Solomon had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of praying <S%H6419><s%> all this prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplication <S%H8467><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, he arose <S%H6965><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, from kneeling <S%H3766><s%> on his knees <S%H1290><s%> with his hands <S%H3709><s%> spread up <S%H6566><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
